name: Absol
author: Hasuno
flavor_text: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom bringer.

abilities.name: Lamentation
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), discard a random card from your opponent’s hand.

attacks.name: Shadow Cage
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.
